problem.markdown:
>>Which statement describes an explicit measure? <<
(x) An explicit measure is one that you create manually. ( ) An explicit measure is one that comes from outside the data model ( ) An explicit measure is one that Excel generates for you when you add fields to the Values area of a pivot table. ( ) An explicit measure is one that you create using MDX formulas.
[explanation] An explicit measure is a measure that you manually create. [explanation]
problem.p: Which statement describes an explicit measure?
